  • Method Details

    • calcVictoryPointsLeaderCard

      private int calcVictoryPointsLeaderCard()
      Calculates victory points obtained from the leader cards summing the victory points given from each leader card.
      Returns:
      the result calculated

    • calcVictoryPointsPlayer

      public int calcVictoryPointsPlayer()
      Calculates victory points obtained from the player summing the victory points obtained from the leader cards and from personal board.
      Returns:
      the result calculated

    • moveResources

      public void moveResources​(Game game, MoveActionInterface move) throws MoveResourcesException
      Performs the move action specified calling the handleMove method passing the player's warehouse where to perform the move.
      Parameters:
      game - the game instance, used to notify clients sending them an update when the move action has been correctly performed
      move - the move action object, containing all the infos needed to perform the move
      Throws:
      MoveResourcesException - when an error occurred while performing the move action

    • checkLeaderActivation

      public boolean checkLeaderActivation​(int index)
      Checks if the requirements of the card specified are satisfied by the player
      Parameters:
      index - of the leader card to check

    • checkLeaderStatus

      public boolean checkLeaderStatus​(int index)
      Checks if a leader card can be activated. A leader card that is already active cannot be activated again.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the leader card to check

    • activateLeaderCard

      public void activateLeaderCard​(int index)
      Activates a leader card. If the leader card has an effect of type EXTRADEPOT, instantiates the extra depot in the player's warehouse. This method is called only after having checked all the requirements are satisfied.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the leader card to activate

    • discardLeaderCard

      public LeaderCard discardLeaderCard​(int index)
      Discards a leader card only if it isn't active. If the card is correctly discarded, also moves the faith marker of the player by one according to game rules.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the leader card to discard
      Returns:
      the leader card discarded

    • performInitialLeaderChoice

      public void performInitialLeaderChoice​(Game game, int firstLeader, int secondLeader)
      Performs the initial leader choice discarding two leader cards specified by the two indexes passed as parameters
      Parameters:
      game - the game instance, used to notify the clients sending them an update
      firstLeader - the index of the first leader card to discard
      secondLeader - the index of the second leader card to discard

    • performInitialResourcesChoice

      public void performInitialResourcesChoice​(Game game, java.util.List<Pair<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer>> chosenResources)
      Performs the initial resources choice positioning each resource in the depot specified
      Parameters:
      game - the game instance, used to notify the clients sending them an update
      chosenResources - list containing, for each resource, the depot index where to put the resource

    • getChosenResources

      private java.util.List<ResourceType> getChosenResources​(java.util.List<Pair<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer>> chosenResources)
      Method used to retrieve only the chosen resources from the list of pair containing also the depot index where to put the resource. This method has been used in order to clear the infos to notify to the client from unnecessary data.
      Parameters:
      chosenResources - list containing, for each resource, the depot index where to put the resource
      Returns:
      the list of the chosen resources

      Parameters:
      leader - the index of the leader card to throw
